attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: now the scots voters may decide to end the union therefore voiding our membership of the e.u. an english parliament is essential. let there be no delay.

rejection.details: There is a very similar petition, http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/England/ Please consider signing prior to resubmission.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
